name: Blocks Room
description:
A simple first person puzzle game concept.

Bring the props to their doors, when the doors ask for them. 

You can stack up to 5 objects at a time by holding them.

Sometimes doors may ask for the props in order. 

If a pillar of 5 blocks accumulates, you lose.

Controls 
W, A, S & D: Movement
Left click: Pick up prop
Right click: Drop prop
Mouse move: 3D camera movement
Space bar: Jump (up to 2 extra boosts, use them carefully!)
Mouse scroll up/down: Increase/decrease camera Horizontal and Vertical speeds respectively.
Control + Mouse scroll up/down: Increase/decrease FOV respectively.

Make sure you left click the game screen both on small screen and full screen modes so that the mouse isn't limited by your screen's constraints.
